Tinitell, a wristphone for kids

Tinitell, a wristphone for kids — I’m not sure about the “wearables” category just yet, but this type of device is brilliant; particularly for young children. Tinitell was funded on Kickstarter back on May 29, but recent updates don’t mention much in terms of near-term production.

Published November 3 2014

Enjoy your day.
